stimulusHtml: Let f be the function given by f( x )= x 2 âˆ’2x+3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40FE@ . The tangent line to the graph of f at x=2 is used to approximate values of f(x). Which of the following is the greatest value of x for which the error resulting from this tangent line approximation is less than 0.5?
